charges.charge_description: 18:2252.F SEXUAL EXPLOITATION OF MINORS-defendant did transport and ship ininterstate commerce child pornography (1)
18:1462.F IMPORT OR TRANSPORT OBSCENE MATTER-defendant did use an interactive computer service to transport child pornography (2)
18:2252.F SEXUAL EXPLOITATION OF MINORS-defendant did transport and ship ininterstate commerce child pornography (3)
18:1462.F IMPORT OR TRANSPORT OBSCENE MATTER-defendant did use an interactive computer service to transport child pornography (4)
18:2252.F SEXUAL EXPLOITATION OF MINORS-defendant did transport and ship ininterstate commerce child pornography (5)
18:1462.F IMPORT OR TRANSPORT OBSCENE MATTER-defendant did use an interactive computer service to transport child pornography (6)
18:2252.F SEXUAL EXPLOITATION OF MINORS-defendant did transport and ship ininterstate commerce child pornography (7)
18:1462.F IMPORT OR TRANSPORT OBSCENE MATTER-defendant did use an interactive computer service to transport child pornography (8)

On or about Dec. 29, 2002 in Midland County, in the Western District of Texas defendant did, import and/or transport obscene matters in violation of Title 18 USC 1426; and did ship in interstate commerce material involving sexual exploitation of minors, in violation of Title 18 USC 2252 [7:03-m-13]
